description: Observations to Corporation of London in connection with proposed redevelopment of site with a building which would rise to a maximum of 11 storeys containing approx. 72,000 sq.m of office floorspace and some retail space.
decision_conditions: OBSERVATION:  The EIS must take into account strategic and local views from neighbouring boroughs, as well as taking into account how the proposal would affect the wider setting of St. Paul's in terms of its 'background', as seen from these vantage points.  I look forward to receiving a copy of the application and the relevant chapter from the ES once the application has been submitted.
ward:
Within City (near Bunhill Ward)
Within City (near Clerkenwell Ward)
